title: Copper Pickaxe
summaries: The Copper Pickaxe is an early-game pickaxe. Its alternate ore counterpart is the Tin Pickaxe.

The Copper Pickaxe has a -1 range attribute, which means it can only mine 4 blocks to the sides, and 2 blocks above and below the player. Like other low-tier pickaxes, it can only mine <linked>blocks</linked> and ores weaker than <linked>Meteorite</linked> (which requires a pickaxe with at least 50% <linked>pickaxe power</linked>, e.g. a <linked>Tungsten Pickaxe</linked>).

The Copper Pickaxe is usually the first pickaxe that the player will obtain, as newly created non-Journey Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) characters spawn with this item in their second inventory slot.
Additionally, the Copper Pickaxe can be purchased from the Merchant for 5 SC.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.
